mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_NM , BOOK_PRICE , BOOK_STOCK , BOOK_IMG , BOOK_PUB , BOOK_AUTHOR FROM BOOK where `BOOK_NO` = #{page} ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC

SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_NM , BOOK_PRICE , BOOK_STOCK , BOOK_IMG , BOOK_PUB , BOOK_AUTHOR FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR BOOK_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC
SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_NM , BOOK_PRICE , BOOK_STOCK , BOOK_IMG , BOOK_PUB , BOOK_AUTHOR FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NO = #{book_no}
